statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ 4 \\ 14 \\ -10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -34 \\ -13 \\ -35 \\ 22 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
